title: The SoulTaker: Tamashii-gari (SoulTaker)
synopsis: Kyousuke Date comes home one night and finds his mother dying in a pool of her own blood. In her final moments, she stabs him in the chest. After a swift recovery, Kyousuke searches for answers regarding his mother's motives, but finds more than he bargained for when he is attacked by two rival organizations: the Hospital and the Kirihara Group.
related_anime: ['Nurse Witch Komugi-chan Magikarte', 'The SoulTaker: Tamashii-gari - Komugi Daisakusen']
